section.6: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan

hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ï·º) said: A surah of the Qur'an containing thirty verses will intercede its reader till he will be forgiven. That is: "Blessed is He in Whose Hand is the sovereignty" (Surah 67)
